Class ThreadedQueryRunner

  • java.lang.Object

    QueryRunner

    public class ThreadedQueryRunner
extends Object
implements QueryRunner
    Multi-threaded implementation of class to run queries.
    Author:
    Don Metzler, Jimmy Lin
